com.mcc.ul
Class AutoShutdownConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.mcc.ul.AutoShutdownConfig

public class AutoShutdownConfig
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to get or set the auto shutdown configuration of a DAQ device. To create an instance of this class, call the getAutoShutdownConfig() method of the PowerConfig class.

Method Summary
 void disable()
          Disables auto shutdown.
 void enable(int delay)
          Enables auto shutdown.
 AutoShutdownCriteria getCriteria()
          Returns the AutoShutdownCriteria enumeration indicating the shutdown criteria configured for the current instance of AutoShutdownConfig.
 int getDelay()
          Returns the delay before shutdown.
 boolean isEnabled()
          Returns true if auto shutdown is enabled.
